title: Understanding Marginal Tax Systems: How Bonuses Impact Your Tax Bracket
subtitle: Learn how holiday bonuses affect your tax bracket and how marginal tax systems determine what you owe. A simple breakdown of Tyler's 2023 tax scenario.
content:
Tyler? Yep. Looks like you made $180,050 this year.

Yep. Do you owe us? $57,626.

Oh, no, $10,000 of that was a holiday bonus.

Yep, and that bonus bumped you up to the 32% tax bracket.

Sucker.

Uh, that's not how taxes work.

Oh, we know how taxes work.

I don't think you do.

32% only applies to my income that is over $170,050. That's how a marginal tax system works.

Yeah, I know. Do you?

So instead of $57,000, you just owe us $37,000?

Well, we haven't even talked about deductions yet, but it looks like this might be all you can handle for one day.
